meanings.definition: A type of food consisting of a sausage that is coated in batter and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: At the fair, I tried the delicious pogos for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The food truck sells pogos that are always a hit with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: For a special treat, my mom surprised us with homemade pogos for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly fried pogos filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The crispy exterior of the pogo contrasted perfectly with the juicy sausage inside.

meanings.definition: To jump or bounce up and down on a pogo stick.
meanings.sent1: Children love to pogo in the park on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to pogo quickly and was soon bouncing with ease.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce as they raced to see who could pogo the highest.
meanings.sent4: His energy seemed endless as he continued to pogo for hours without tiring.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the pogo stick hitting the ground echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A brand of stick used for playing the game of pogs.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new set of pogos to play with my friends this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of colorful pogos for sale.
meanings.sent3: During recess, we would challenge each other to pogo battles in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent4: The pogo felt sturdy in my hand, ready for some intense pog games.
meanings.sent5: With a flick of the wrist, the pogo sent the pog flying across the table.
